# tagtango

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A web app to compare single-cell annotations. Soon available online.

## Install the app locally
If you prefer running the app locally, you can also install it from Github

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("bernibra/tagtango") 
```

and run:

``` r
tagtango::run_app()
```
